persName.roleName: King of Great Britain Ireland and the British Dominions beyond the seas Emperor of India

note.p: Birth: White Lodge, Richmond Park, London, England (23 June 1894)
Death: Bois de Boulogne, Paris (28 May 1972)
Burial: The royal mausoleum at Frogmore
Honours: KG 1910; KT 1922; KP 1927; GCB ; GCSI ; GCMG ; GCIE ; GCVO ; GBE ; MC ; Duke of Windsor 1937
Notes: He was Royal Fellow from his election until his death, excluding the period during which he was King, when his membership status was Patron.
